dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey B, guess what I just heard about? Sounds pretty incredible.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey B, guess what I just heard about? Sounds pretty incredible.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, do tell! Spill the beans.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, do tell! Spill the beans.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, there's this new event called Reconnect. It's, uh, the first high-tech exhibition right next to the beach.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, there's this new event called Reconnect. It's, uh, the first high-tech exhibition right next to the beach.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Reconnect is the first high-tech exhibition to be held right next to the beach - with the signature of Z Empire in Athens.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, a tech expo *on the beach*? That's a game-changer! Where is this happening?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, a tech expo on the beach? That's a game-changer! Where is this happening?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? It's in Athens, Greece, actually, at the Grand Resort Lagonissi. And it’s coming up soon, like September 28th to October 1st.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? It's in Athens, Greece, actually, at the Grand Resort Lagonissi. And it's coming up soon, like September twenty eighth to October first.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It will take place from September 28 to October 1 at Grand Resort Lagonissi.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, Athens, beachside tech... I'm listening. Who's gonna be there, like, um, just local folks?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, Athens, beachside tech... I'm listening. Who's gonna be there, like, um, just local folks?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, no, definitely not! This is huge. We're talking all the key players from the electronics industry, Greece and abroad. Decision-makers, manufacturers, retailers, [interrupts] tech experts...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no, definitely not! This is huge. We're talking all the key players from the electronics industry, Greece and abroad. Decision-makers, manufacturers, retailers, tech experts...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All the key players of the electronics industry from all around Greece and abroad will be present. Decision-makers, manufacturers, retailers, and technology experts will join forces in one event that has never happened before in Greece.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlapping] So, like, the big guns are showing up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, the big guns are showing up.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And it's not just a bunch of boring booths. They've got, um, a CEO Lounge, networking events, and something called '90' to impress' where companies present their portfolios.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And it's not just a bunch of boring booths. They've got, um, a C E O Lounge, networking events, and something called ninety to impress where companies present their portfolios.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For three days, in the specially designed spaces of Grand Resort Lagonissi, the participants will have the opportunity to use the CEO Lounge and network through a series of live sessions and activities - such as 90' to impress where each company will present its portfolio and services.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's pretty clever. I heard the booths themselves are, like, tailor-made, too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's pretty clever. I heard the booths themselves are, like, tailor-made, too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All these will take place during the exhibition in the specially designed and state-of-the-art booths that are tailor-made to the needs of each participant.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, totally state-of-the-art. But here's the best part, B. The experience doesn't just stop when the exhibition closes for the day.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, totally state-of-the-art. But here's the best part, B. The experience doesn't just stop when the exhibition closes for the day.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: But the whole experience of Reconnect does not stop here. After the exhibition, for three consecutive nights, special themed parties, gala dinners, and fashion shows will take place at Achillion Ribas, a magnificent venue overlooking the Saronic Gulf.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: After the exhibition, for three consecutive nights, there are special themed parties, gala dinners, and even fashion shows at this amazing place called Achillion Ribas. It overlooks the Saronic Gulf!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: After the exhibition, for three consecutive nights, there are special themed parties, gala dinners, and even fashion shows at this amazing place called Achillion Ribas. It overlooks the Saronic Gulf!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: After the exhibition, for three consecutive nights, special themed parties, gala dinners, and fashion shows will take place at Achillion Ribas, a magnificent venue overlooking the Saronic Gulf.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, so it's, um, business by day, party by night? That's quite a combo.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, so it's, um, business by day, party by night? That's quite a combo.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much! Greek and international designers, a different one every night. It’s really blending business and pleasure, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much! Greek and international designers, a different one every night. It's really blending business and pleasure, you know?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Greek and non-Greek designers, a different one every night, will present their creations and carry us away to a unique experience that combines business and pleasure.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Sounds like Z Empire, who's hosting it, really pulled out all the stops for this one.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sounds like Z Empire, who's hosting it, really pulled out all the stops for this one.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Reconnect, hosted by Z Empire, offers a new experience to both exhibitors and visitors.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. It's, like, a truly unique event. Anyone in tech should, uh, definitely check it out.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. It's, like, a truly unique event. Anyone in tech should, uh, definitely check it out.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is a truly unique event that no one should miss.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I'm already mentally packing my bags, to be honest.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I'm already mentally packing my bags, to be honest.
